item.title: Funpk resolved
item.dc:creator: @smokin_flax smokin flax
item.description:
@smokin_flax wrote:

	public void applyDead() {
		this.c.respawnTimer = 10;
		this.c.isDead = false;
		if (this.c.duelStatus != 6) {
			this.c.killerId = this.findKiller();
			final Client o = (Client) PlayerHandler.players[this.c.killerId];
			if (o != null) {
				if (!(this.c.npcIndex > 0) && (this.c.inPits == false)) {
				}
				if (this.c.killerId != this.c.playerId) {
					o.sendMessage("You have defeated " + this.c.playerName);
				}
				if (this.c.inWild()) {
					o.pkPoints += 5;
					o.sendMessage("You have received 5 Pk Points");
				} else if (c.inFunPk) {
						o.sendMessage("You didn't earn a point as you're in fun pk.");
						return;
					}
				}
				this.c.playerKilled = this.c.playerId;
				if (o.duelStatus == 5) {
					o.duelStatus++;
				}
			}
		this.c.faceUpdate(0);
		this.c.npcIndex = 0;
		this.c.playerIndex = 0;
		this.c.stopMovement();
		if (this.c.duelStatus <= 4) {
			this.c.sendChatMessage("Oh dear you are dead!");
		} else if (this.c.duelStatus != 6) {
			this.c.sendChatMessage("You have lost the duel!");
		}
		this.resetDamageDone();
		this.c.specAmount = 10;
		this.c.getItems().addSpecialBar(
				this.c.playerEquipment[this.c.playerWeapon]);
		this.c.lastVeng = 0;
		this.c.vengOn = false;

		this.resetFollowers();
		this.c.attackTimer = 10;
		this.removeAllWindows();
		this.c.tradeResetNeeded = true;
	}

Read full topic

item.title: Funpk resolved
item.dc:creator: @Brandontan Brandontan
item.description:
@Brandontan wrote:

how do i make it to where you DON’T gain pkp in there? here is my method:

public void applyDead() { c.respawnTimer = 10; c.isDead = false; if(c.duelStatus != 6) { //c.killerId = c.getCombat().getKillerId(c.playerId); c.killerId = findKiller(); Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[c.killerId]; if(o != null) { if(!(c.npcIndex > 0) && c.inPits == false){ } if (c.killerId != c.playerId) o.sendMessage("You have defeated "+Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName)+"!"); if(c.inWild() && !o.inFunPk){ o.pkPoints += 5; o.sendMessage("You have received 5 Pk Points"); } c.playerKilled = c.playerId; if(o.duelStatus == 5) { o.duelStatus++; } } }
